channel.title: Ubuntu Security Podcast
channel.description: Recent content on Ubuntu Security Podcast

item.title: About
item.description: Ubuntu Security Podcast is a weekly* podcast discussing the latest updates and developments from the Ubuntu Security Team.

item.title: Contact
item.description: security@ubuntu.com #ubuntu-hardended on the Freenode IRC network @ubuntu_sec on twitter

item.title: Episode 0
item.description: Includes a summary of the security vulnerabilities and fixes from the last week as well as a discussion on some of the goings on in the wider Ubuntu Security community. Introduction What will be covered Overview of latest security updates for Ubuntu In depth discussion of trending CVEs Other things the team has been up to This week in Ubuntu Security Updates SegmentSmack (CVE-2018-5390) (USN-3732-1) DoS via expensive algorithmic computation in TCP stream reassembly Requires attacker to have an existing TCP session Affecting kernel >= 4.
